# Differential equations

**example:**

$$ a = kx$$

$$\frac{d²x}{dt²}=kx$$

$$\frac{dy}{dx}=f(x,y)$$

**variable- separable differenial equation**

$$\frac{dy}{dx}=g(x)h(y)$$

$$\int\frac{1}{h(y)}=\int g(x)dx$$

## Population growth model

$$P=P_0e^{kt}$$

$$t_0=0$$

$$\frac{dP}{dt}=kP$$

$$\frac{dP}{dt}=g(P)h(t)$$
We place P on one side and ts on the others

$$\int\frac{1}{P}dP=\int k dt$$

$$ln|P|=kt+C$$

$$|P|=e^{kt+C}$$
